PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE 
 
Payconiq is a free App that enables you:
- to pay in stores, your bills, in other Apps, in online shops across the Benelux,
- to send, receive and request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s). 
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- Transfers and payments from € 0.01 up to € 2,500 
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send and request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers 

* A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The BGL BNP Paribas Payconiq App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your biometrics or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: EUR 2,500). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day). 
 
* QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy. 
 
* SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
Payconiq is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated Payconiq, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is send out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated Payconiq, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account. 
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment. 
 
* IN STORE PAYMENT WITH PAYCONIQ QR CODES
 
Truly contactless payments with Payconiq QR codes: launch the Payconiq App, scan the Payconiq QR code and the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your biometrics/PIN Code and you’re done.

* BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the Payconiq QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided Payconiq payments are accepted. 
 
Feel free to use it at Payconiq partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. You may even add a tip and then just leave right away. 
 
* PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use Payconiq on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the Payconiq button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your Payconiq App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE
 
PAYCONIQ is a free App that enables you to pay in stores or online, to pay your bills and to send, receive & request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s) in Luxembourg.
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- From 0.01 € up to 10,000 €
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send & request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers
 
*** A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The PAYCONIQ App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your Fingerprint or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: 2500 EUR). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day).
 
*** QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy.
 
*** SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
PAYCONIQ is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated PAYCONIQ, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is sent out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated PAYCONIQ, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account.
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment.
 
*** IN STORE PAYMENT 
 
Truly contactless payments: launch the PAYCONIQ App, ,scan the  PAYCONIQ QR code, the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your fingerprint/PIN Code and you’re done.
 
*** BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the PAYCONIQ QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided PAYCONIQ payments are accepted.
 
Feel free to use it at PAYCONIQ partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. 
 
*** PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use PAYCONIQ on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the PAYCONIQ button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your PAYCONIQ App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

You can purchase and pay in-stores with MB WAY QR code displayed at the POS, buy online with MB NET virtual cards, find charities, and even win prizes using CHALLENGE! You can send, receive, request money and split bills without carrying your wallet. 

MB WAY app is the way to pay to more than 3,7 million users, who daily take advantage of its unique features. 

Pay with MB WAY in your favorite stores.
To start using MB WAY, you can sign up just downloading the app or in a MULTIBANCO ATM. Just link your card with your cell phone number and define your MB WAY PIN! You can also activate your fingertip and facial identification through your smartphone. MB WAY it’s easy, convenient and fast. MB WAY, just pay!

Pay with MB WAY

When you pay in-store purchases, just select the “Pagar com MB WAY” button. You can choose the following options to pay: 

- QR Code – Select the option in your app, and read the QR Code at the payment terminal. If your purchase exceeds the threshold for PIN authentication, you must authorize the purchase, and just then you will receive the confirmation.

To pay at online stores, select the MB WAY payment method, insert your mobile number and you will receive a notification to confirm the in-app payment.

Purchase with MB NET

Withdraw money at MULTIBANCO

To Withdraw Money with MB WAY click on “Levantar Dinheiro” in the app, choose the amount and enter your PIN. Then, with the code generated, go to a MULTIBANCO ATM, press the green button and choose the option "Levantar Dinheiro", enter the code and withdraw your money.
You can also generate a code for someone else to make a withdrawal at MULTIBANCO. Select “Levantar Dinheiro”, choose the amount and the option “Partilhe o código de levantamento com outra pessoa”, select the phone number of that person and enter your MB WAY PIN or touch ID or face ID! 

Send money

Request money

Split an account

Win prizes with CHALLENGE

ANote Music builds the bridge between music and finance: the first marketplace, exchange and trading platform for investing in Music Copyrights, providing liquidity to music creators. 

Record Labels and Artists have can now enter into an innovative and transparent source of funding, investors and music fans have now access to an alternative asset class, which yields royalties and generates high income uncorrelated with traditional financial markets.

ANote Music is the efficient and user-friendly way to buy into music rights and trade shares of songs. After performing legal due diligence, the rights are offered on our primary market, where bids from investors are collected. Once allocated to investors, the shares of rights become tradable on the exchange. As songs generate cash flows (royalties) every time they are played, ANote Music takes care of distributing the royalties to investors.
Transactions and royalty distributions are recorded into our Blockchain to ensure safety and keep track of the ownership chain.

By positioning itself as the bridge between the Music Industry and the Capital Markets, the aim of ANote Music is to sustain the market of music rights and foster its liquidity.

Ob Banken, Depots, Krypto oder Versicherungen: Mit der Erfolgs-App aus “Die Höhle der Löwen” hast du die volle Kontrolle über deine Finanzen
 
Deine Vorteile
 
- Alle deine Bankkonten, Depots und Krypto-Accounts in einer App
- Volle Kontrolle über deine Einnahmen, Ausgaben, Verträge & Abos
- Kostenloser Vertragswecker & Kündigungsfunktion per Fingertipp
- Smarte Budgets für volle Kosten-Kontrolle
- Ermittlung von individuellen Sparpotentialen & Analysemöglichkeiten
- Persönlicher Zugang zu Finanzexperten, bei Fragen rund um Versicherung & Co.
- Dauerhaft kostenlos nutzbar


Alle Konten in einer App
 
Du hast mehrere Bankkonten, Depots, Verrechnungskonten oder Krypto-Accounts? Da verliert man schnell mal den Überblick. Mit unserer Finanz-App kannst du alle deine Konten einfach und sicher verknüpfen und erhältst damit die volle Übersicht über deine Finanzen in nur einer einzigen App.

Volle Kontrolle über deine Einnahmen & Ausgaben
 
Ein Haushaltsbuch zu führen, um dein Gehalt und deine Budgets im Auge zu behalten ist dir zu stressig? Unsere Statistik zeigt dir an, wie viel Geld bis zum nächsten Gehaltseingang noch übrig ist. Mit unserem digitalen Haushaltsbuch wird Geld zu sparen so einfach wie noch nie. Manage deine Finanzen kinderleicht in nur einer App und fang an, dir einen Notgroschen aufzubauen, um unvorhergesehene Ausgaben abzudecken. Mit unserer App siehst du deine aktuellen Ausgaben all deiner Konten. Finanzguru geht noch einen Schritt weiter und zeigt dir an, welche Buchungen diesen Monat voraussichtlich noch auf dich zukommen werden.
 
Automatische Vertragserkennung
 
Anhand deiner Bankbuchungen erkennt unsere künstliche Intelligenz automatisch deine Verträge und Versicherungen und listet diese für dich übersichtlich in deinem digitalen Vertragsordner auf. So findest du zum Beispiel Abos, für die du immer noch bezahlst, die du aber gar nicht mehr nutzt.
 
Kostenlos Kündigen
 
Verträge und Versicherungen rechtssicher kündigen war noch nie so einfach. Die Adresse des Vertragsanbieters hat der Finanzguru für dich schon rausgesucht, deine Kundennummer musst du auch nicht mehr suchen. Einfach per Fingertipp bestätigen und die Kündigung ist versendet. Das Beste: Die Kündigung ist kostenlos.

Hilfreiche Analysen deiner Ausgaben
Behalte in jedem Augenblick die volle Kontrolle über dein Geld mit dem Analyse-Reiter. Anhand von klugen Trends erkennst du sofort, wie du dein Ausgabeverhalten optimieren und deine Finanzen auf ein neues Level bringen kannst.
 
Finanzguru Plus - Die einfachste Art, das Meiste aus deinem Geld zu machen (kostenpflichtiges Premium-Angebot)
 
Mit Finanzguru Plus wirst du zum absoluten Finanz-Profi. 
Dein frei verfügbares Einkommen zeigt dir zu jedem Zeitpunkt an, wie viel Geld du bis zum Ende des Monats noch ausgeben kannst. Setze dir smarte Budgets und spare auf diese Weise jeden Monat bares Geld. Hilfreiche Analysen und Benachrichtigungen helfen dir dabei, noch mehr aus deinen persönlichen Finanzen herauszuholen. 
 
Versicherungen & individuelle Beratung
 
Mit dem “Finanzguru Versicherungsservice” bekommst du die volle Übersicht über alle Vertragsdetails. Analysiere deinen individuellen Versicherungs-Bedarf. Finanzguru zeigt dir, in welchen Lebensbereichen du bereits gut versichert bist und in welchem Bereich dir noch wichtige Absicherungen fehlen. Bei komplexeren Fragen steht dir eine Team von Versicherungsexperten für eine kostenlose, unabhängige und individuelle Beratung zur Verfügung.


Datensicherheit
